comments:
EcoreUtil.copy() throws ClassCastException when coping EList containing Strings.

Invoking the enclosed test class causes the following exception using the emf-
sdo-SDK-I200502030800 build:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ClassCastException: java.lang.String
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil$Copier.copyAll
(EcoreUtil.java:347)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil$Copier.copyAttribute
(EcoreUtil.java:488)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil$Copier.copy(EcoreUtil.java:368)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil.copy(EcoreUtil.java:297)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.events.cbe.impl.EcoreUtil_Defect_Test.main
(EcoreUtil_Defect_Test.java:28)

The test class requires the following TPTP (www.eclipse.org/tptp) and EMF JARs:

hexr.jar (org.eclipse.hyades.execution)
hlcore.jar (org.eclipse.hyades.logging.core)
hlcbe101.jar (org.eclipse.hyades.logging.core)
ecore.jar (org.eclipse.emf.ecore)
common.jar (org.eclipse.emf.core)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 87456 ***
Transferring to TPTP project for tracking purposes.

TemplateContentHandlerImpl throws ClassCastException when coping ELists 
containing Strings using EcoreUtil.copy().
